definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy
car with a new type of propulsion system (hybrid, hydrogen-powered etc)

sentences.english: On the contrary, trough exists over the Plateau, so the eddy kinetic energy transport channel moves to the south.
sentences.chinese: 高原上为槽时，涡动动能的输送通道偏南。

sentences.english: They are derived by use of the ratio of the macroscopic kinetic energy density to the magnetic energy density.
sentences.chinese: 它们是利用宏观动能密度对磁能密度的比例导出的。

sentences.english: The kinetic energy weapons are electromagnetic weapons and are extremely powerful.
sentences.chinese: 动能武器是电磁武器和非常强大的。

sentences.english: Planning and controlling peripheries of China have an economic power.
sentences.chinese: 中国周边经略具有丰富的经济动能。

sentences.english: The telescopic projectile is a kind of new idea for the KE projectiles.
sentences.chinese: 伸缩式双弹芯穿甲弹是动能穿甲弹的一个新概念。

sentences.english: Pioneer is a concept shoe that coverts kinetic walking energy into electrical energy.
sentences.chinese: 此双概念鞋拉开了动能转变为电能的帷幕。

sentences.english: The energy of an earthquake results from the power differences of block bumping or rubbing.
sentences.chinese: 地震能量来自于块体间撞击或摩擦时损失的动能。

sentences.english: Well, kinetic energy has clearly increased.
In this case, I cannot convert linear motion into the flywheel.
sentences.chinese: 在这个例子中，我不能把直线动能转化到飞轮上。

sentences.english: Thelow-frequency barotropic kinetic energy in the Asian monsoon area is smaller.
sentences.chinese: 亚洲季风区低频正压动能较小。

sentences.english: The turbulence power distribution inner of stadium offers reference for the analysis on the simultaneous wind.
sentences.chinese: 体育场内部湍动能的分布为脉动风的分析提供了依据。

sentences.english: Finally, the paper designs the ground-based kinetic energy weapon simulation system based on HLA.
sentences.chinese: 最后基于HLA对地基动能武器仿真系统进行了设计。
还有垂直的方向上动能。

sentences.english: However, the UK Quad poster has a spectacular art-deco with tremendous kinetic power.
sentences.chinese: 然而，英国张贴有壮观的装饰着巨大的动能力量。

definition: to bounce/to bounce back/to boomerang/to ricochet/rebound (of stock market etc)/bounce/backlash/negative repercussions
(of trains) up (i.e. towards the capital)/(of river boats) to go against the current/to submit (a document) to higher authorities
to slow down/to ease up/to abate/slowdown/downturn
many-headed/many-layered (authority)/devolved (as opposed to centralized)/pluralistic/(as classifier) number of animals/long term (finance)/long (investment)
moving average index (used in financial analysis)
upward/up/to advance/to try to improve oneself/to make progress
(of trains) down (i.e. away from the capital)/(of river boats) to travel downstream/to issue (a document) to lower bureaucratic levels/(of writing on the page) vertical, proceeding from top to bottom
